name: ORDER_RAD_PRELIM
description: This table stores prelimming physician information for imaging procedures.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of preliming radiologists for an order.

columns.name: PROV_ID_PROV_NAME
columns.description: The name of the service provider. This item may be hidden in a public view of the CLARITY_SER table.

columns.name: PRELIM_DT
columns.description: The date when the provider marked the study as preliminary.
